ETYMOLOGY: From Old English hlot 'share, portion, destiny, object used in drawing lots,' from Proto-Germanic *hlutam (compare Old Norse hlutr 'share, lot,' Old High German hloz 'share, portion'). The sense of 'parcel of land' developed from the idea of land distributed by lot.

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A word or phrase (such as 'much,' 'few,' or 'a lot of') that indicates the quantity or amount of something.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A large number or amount of something; a great deal.
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: There were a lot of people waiting in line for tickets.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 有很多人在排队等候买票。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: An adverb is a word or phrase that modifies or qualifies an adjective, verb, or other adverb or a word group, expressing a relation of place, time, circumstance, manner, cause, degree, etc.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: Very much; to a great extent.
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: I like this song a lot.

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A noun is a word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things (common noun), or to name a particular one of these (proper noun).
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A parcel of land, especially one for building on or for a specific purpose.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 一块土地，尤指用于建筑或特定用途的土地。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: They bought a small lot to build their dream house.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 他们买了一小块地来建造他们的梦想之家。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A noun is a word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things (common noun), or to name a particular one of these (proper noun).
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: An item or set of items for sale at an auction.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 拍卖中的一件或一组物品。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: Lot number 57 is a rare antique vase.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 第57号拍品是一个罕见的古董花瓶。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A noun is a word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things (common noun), or to name a particular one of these (proper noun).
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A person's destiny or situation in life.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 一个人的命运或人生境遇。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: It was her lot to suffer much hardship in life.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 在生活中遭受诸多苦难是她的命运。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A transitive verb (vtr) takes a direct object, and 'adv' refers to an adverbial particle.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: To divide into portions or lots.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 将（某物）分成若干份或地块。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The developer lotted out the large estate into smaller building plots.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 开发商将这块大地产分成若干小建筑地块。

REGISTER: General usage, with some informal and formal senses.
